name: Red Wolfing
description:
For a website that was developed by WolfKodi - https://wolfkodi.dyndns.org/wolfing/


Red Wolfing uses the Dark Mode codes of Wolfing and in simplicity, darkens everything with a hint of red.


If there's any bugs, comment below or you can add me on my discord: Lee#6621. Alternatively, you can find me on Wolfing by the user name "Lee"
additional_info:
17th May 2018 v0.0.1 - Initial Release [1 Elk] v0.0.2 - Fixed UI issues [1 Rabbit]
20th May 2018 v0.0.3 - Now with more red! [1 Fox]
28th May 2018 v0.0.4 - Fixed font weight on buttons. [2 Rabbits]
9th June 2018 Darkened Pup rank color slightly
6th August 2018 v1.1.4 - Updated icons. I feel like these are better.
22nd August 2018 v2.0.0 - Edited scrollbar
